title: Brainstorm Mode: Focused Writing with Mobile-Web Sync
description:
Overview
- Distraction-free writing mode + Idea Inbox for judgment-free capture
- Mobile capture sync (text/voice/photo) into web inbox
- Manual sorting by default; optional auto-sort later

Foundation already implemented (files)
- packages/state/src/progressive.ts (captures store + selectors)
- packages/core/src/inbox/types.ts (capture types + helpers)
- packages/db/src/queries/captures.ts (CRUD + inbox fetch)
- packages/sync/src/syncEngine.ts, types.ts, web/dexieDb.ts, native/sqliteDb.ts (sync + local storage)
- apps/mobile/components/capture/* + apps/mobile/hooks/useCapture.ts (mobile capture UI)

Web work remaining
- Inbox panel in sidebar + dedicated inbox view
- Capture processing UI (archive/process/convert)
- Freewrite view with timer + autosave to captures
acceptance_criteria:
- Sidebar shows Idea Inbox with count + items
- Inbox items can be processed/archived without altering manuscript
- No AI evaluation by default; optional auto-sort is opt-in
notes: Note (2026-01-03): Expo SDK 54 integration should surface in the sidebar Idea Inbox so mobile captures appear seamlessly on web.
